text: Anja Mittag (born in Karl-Marx-Stadt, East Germany on 16 May 1985) is a German association football player who currently plays for Paris Saint-Germain FÃ©minines and the Germany women's national football team. She has won the 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup, UEFA Women's Euro 2009 and the UEFA Women's Euro 2013. She was also Sweden's Player of the Year in 2012http://www.fotbollskanalen.se/dam/klart-hon-ar-arets-spelare-i- damallsvenskan/ Swedish and 2014http://www.sydsvenskan.se/sport/anja-mittag-- malskytt-och-vald-till-arets-spelare/ Swedish while she played in the Damallsvenskan. == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Female footballers Category:German footballers Category:People from Chemnitz Category:Sportspeople from Saxony
title: Anja Mittag
